parameters:
(Looks like there's a leak in the ceiling... Is it raining
outside now?)
Kisanosuke: "Your dinner for tonight, my lord. Please eat."
Kokuyou Tengu: "Houzukijii... I'm grateful, I'll partake."
Being suddenly imprisoned... I understand how you must feel.

It can't be helped. Imprisoning a family member must have
been agonizing for Kotarou as well. He looked quite
distressed.

...Please do not resent Kotarou-sama. The letter stated to
behead you, but it was Kotarou-sama who persuaded the envoy
to keep it to imprisonment only.

So it is... It seems I've conveyed terribly wrong
information to the current lords of Odawara... I thought if
the accurate information about Osaka was reported, we could
bow to the capital and negotiate peace to avoid war. It
seems my and the lord's thinking was too naive.

The illusionist of Fuma that chilled the hearts of
neighboring countries--if you had succeeded as the head,
perhaps we could have seen a different future for Fuma...

Ha! That's a cursed name I discarded when I was presumed
dead. Besides, a ninja who can no longer kill becoming the
head of Fuma would only lower the morale of other ninjas.
Besides, I'm better suited to being a lone wolf.

Please endure life in this cell for a while longer for
Kotarou-sama's sake. I am truly sorry...

Indeed... at least make sure the food is delicious,
Houzukijii. A ninja cannot fight on an empty stomach, just
as with any battle. Please tell Korin and Karin not to
worry.

Yes, that is easily done. Then, for tonight, this is
farewell...

(...The meal is unusually late tonight. Has something
happened...?)
"Kisanosuke-san... Can you hear me? It's me..."
--! That voice, Momiji? Why are you here?

Shh-- Keep your voice down... I've brought Korin-san and
Karin-chan with me.
--Korin! And Karin is with you too?

We put sleeping drugs in the jailer's meal and have taken
the keys to the cell. We can escape from here now.

...! You're saying we should escape? But if I flee while
imprisoned, it will disgrace Kotarou. I cannot go...

But... Recently, another envoy from Odawara came demanding
that either Korin-san or your daughter Karin-chan be handed
over as a hostage. If things remain as they are, your family
will be torn apart.

Yes. That's why I couldn't just sit still... The only chance
for all of us to escape is now. Please hurry...! Quickly--!

Korin, leaving Fuma village without permission has been a
capital offense since ancient times--desertion is such a
grave crime. Are you prepared?

If it means being separated and one of us being taken
hostage, then facing the danger of a capital offense and
escaping is better... If I'm with Kisanosuke-sama, even hell
would be bearable.

...Understood. I want to protect my precious family. Let's
break out of this cell and leave the Fuma village where I
was born and raised. Let's go, Korin. Are you fully prepared
for the journey?

Yes, I have brought the treasured sword passed down through
our family. Let's escape the village before dawn breaks and
run to a place beyond the reach of the Fuma

Indeed. Let's goWe must leave this village as soon as
possible.

Be at ease. I am on your side. It seems you've made up your
mind to break out of this prison cell...

Indeed. It seems I have become unnecessary to this village.
It's painful to part with everyone, but this must be fate.
Then take this with you. Consider it a parting gift.
This is... the sword I entrusted to you?

The blade has been properly dulled. The fittings have also
been adjusted. It shouldn't cause death even if it cuts
someone. Be careful on your journey.
I'm grateful. I owe you a debt of gratitude, Aibara-dono
(--! There are more gatekeepers than usual...!)

...Both of you hide. I'll make it so we can pass through
immediately (whisper)
Hm...? Did I just see someone there...

...Be at ease, it's just a strike with the back of the
sword. I'll have them knocked out for a while as we pass
through this gate.

Incredible...! Kotaro-san took down three guards in an
instant!
...I'm sorry, guards. We need to pass through this gate...

Phew... The gate is open. Now we just need to escape far
away without being found and we'll be safe.

Momiji, I'm sorry for all the trouble. Beyond this great
gate lies the outside of the village. Even if you are the
daughter of the head of the family, leaving without
permission from Kotarou could result in a death penalty for
you as well. You don't need to accompany us any further. I
am grateful

Thank you, Momiji-chan. Despite the danger, you've done so
much for us... I truly appreciate it.

No, please make sure you aren't found by pursuers, descend
the mountain, pass through the cave, and escape to the
Tokaido road. I believe that we will meet again somewhere...
What's that crying sound! In the middle of the night...!?

There's someone collapsed by the gate! Could it be an
intruder has entered!?

(This is bad! If we don't do something, we'll be found by
the patrolling guards! What should we do--!)

----!? Chutarou-sama? Why are you out at this late hour...?
Weren't you imprisoned in the cell?

I see... With Momiji-chan here, I can guess what's
happening. You're planning to leave the Fuma village with
your entire family, aren't you.
Then quickly hide. I will lead the guards away--

Guardsmen! It's me, Ie-Kiku! A suspicious character has fled
to the north side of the village! Everyone, chase after
them!

What, really, Ie-Kiku!? Alright, let's chase the intruder to
the north side!

Phew... The guards have run off in the opposite direction...
I'm grateful for your quick thinking, Ie-Kiku.

No... It's sad to see a loved one go far away, but parting
is also a part of romance... Please take care, Chutarou-
sama. And you as well, Korin-san. Take good care of Karin-
chan.
Ah!? Karin-chan has started crying again...!

We must leave the village quickly or pursuers will come to
this southern side too! I will carry Karin on my back!
Hurry, Korin--!
Please be careful, both of you--
Karin-chan, even if we're apart, stay well...
I am indebted to you. Thank you for your help.

--Chutarou and Karin have dashed through the great gate of
the Fuma village!
--? What's all this commotion in the dead of night, Houzuk?

Yes. There was a baby's cry near the main gate in the middle
of the night, so upon investigation, two guards were found
unconscious. Furthermore, there's no sign of Chutarou-dono
who should have been in the cell.

What? Could it be that my brother... has broken out of
prison?

We've also checked his home but found no sign of his wife
Korin-dono or daughter Karin.

...I see. So they're planning to escape from Fuma village as
a whole family, aren't they?

Unfortunately, that seems to be the only conclusion... A
deserter ninja... What a foolish act.

By the laws of Fuma, we have no choice but to behead
Chutarou's family... What a situation. Despite our firm
negotiations with the Odawara faction not to send any
hostages... Brother... such an impulsive act of escape.

Of course! We cannot let a deserter ninja go just because
they are family; it would set a bad example for the others
in the village! Hurry and pursue them, Houzuk! Gather at
least 50 men!

It's serious, Kisanosuke-dono! There's talk that Chutarou-
san has fled the village with his family!

Is that so... I just woke up because of the commotion...
I'll join the search party as soon as I'm ready.

Pursue them! Split up and chase after Chutarou and his
family--! Find them and capture them without fail! We do not
forgive those who break our laws!
...(Please, all three of you, manage to escape far away--)

Hurry, Korin! We must descend the mountain quickly or they
will catch up to us!
Are you okay!? Is your asthma acting up again?

I'm sorry... don't worry. It's been a while since I've run
such a long distance.

The guards went the other way, but pursuers will likely come
down this southern path as well. I wish we could move faster
but...

...If it looks like I'm going to be caught, please take
Karin and escape by yourself. I beg you.

--! Don't say such foolish things! You, me, and Karin, we
all stick together! Otherwise, there's no point in having
fled the village!

----! (This is bad! The troops have arrived sooner than I
thought! If only we could make it to the cave...!)
Let's hide by the pond over there, Chutarou-sama!

Umu. All we can do is pray to the gods and Buddhas that we
are not found.

They may have already reached the cave halfway up the
mountain! We must find them at all costs!

(Should we spend the night here... But as dawn breaks, it
will only become easier for us to be found... It's a
dilemma. What to do...)
--!? (Karin, please don't cry! If you cry now...!)
~~~~!? We must get away from here...!

Lord of the house! There's a figure in the thickets by the
pond--!

At last, I've found you, brother. No, you are a criminal for
breaking the laws of the Fuma clan, Kotaro--you must be
aware that desertion is a grave offense?

Of course... But I had no choice but to flee. Even if it's
the law, I would protect my family over accepting a death
sentence. I must leave the Fuma village.

...I see. You're that determined. Then there's nothing to be
done.
----!? You've even prepared bows and arrows for this?

As you know, we of the Fuma can see even in the darkest
night... Do you want an arrow to hit your wife? Surrender
peacefully.

Kotaro-dono... It is most regrettable. If only you had
obediently stayed in your cell, this situation would not
have arisen...

Hmph, I too wished to remain compliant. But as the head of
the family, I cannot allow my family to be hostages and sent
to a castle about to become a battlefield. Can you really
say you would stay tied up in a cell, Houzukiji?

No need to say it, Houzuki... Kotaro is now a deserter.
Time cannot be turned back. As the head of the Fuma clan, I
will simply follow the laws and uphold our code.

You there, the crime of escaping from prison without the
head's permission and scattering your family from the
village is severe. By the laws of Fuma, you shall be
beheaded--
...There's no need for mercy or leniency. Cut them down.

(Facing elite Fuma ninjas--it's not going to be easy to
defeat them all with the unsharpened sword given by Mangen-
dono while protecting Korin and Karin.)

(The illusionary orb was confiscated when I was imprisoned.
There's no way forward or back. What should I do...!)

(Should I use the treasured sword that Karin holds? But
there's no guarantee it will cut. The only way out of this
is to take their swords and kill them all... The method
is...)

(...Kotaro-dono's eyes have changed. They're the eyes of
an assassin from his past...)

(...Are you ready to do this, brother? Damn it, to think we
of the same clan must kill each other...!)

If you come any closer... even if you are my brethren--I
will cut you down--!

Kotaro-sama, please calm down! Didn't you swear never to
kill another person again? Was that a lie...!

Korin--!? But as you can see, we're in a desperate
situation. Unless I cut down these 30 people here, I can't
protect you and Karin. That's the only way...

There is just one way... one strategy to avoid this dire
situation. Trust me... and jump into the pond with
me...(whisper whisper)
What--? Into the pond... you say?

Resistance is futile. Both of you should commit suicide
here. We won't kill Karin because she's an infant. Don't
choose a meaningless death for the whole family.
Hold my hand... Yes, tightly... Take a deep breath...

--? What are you planning to do, Korin...? Don't tell me...
really...!
Karin, bear with it just for a little while... ready--set--!
----!! What--? Wait! Are you out of your mind!?
What--? They jumped into the pond, all three of them--?

I can't believe it...! To think they would jump into the
pond with a baby and commit suicide...! What shall we do,
Kotarou-sama? Shall we also jump into the pond?

---! As soon as they surface, shoot them with arrows! Got
it!

Gurgle! (Karin!? She's forming a seal with her fingers--?
What is she planning to do!)

(----!! Unbelievable! Their bodies are... glowing... turning
into stone!? What in the world...!? )

~~~~~~~~~! (It's my first time using this spell, but...
please let it work successfully...!)

(Strange... they've been under far longer than a person can
hold their breath. The fact that they haven't surfaced
yet... what does this mean?)

There's still no sign of them surfacing. Perhaps the pond is
connected to somewhere else...

That's impossible. This pond is deep but isolated. Besides,
they jumped in holding a baby, didn't they? Even if it were
connected somewhere, they should have drowned...

It's been a quarter of an hour (30 minutes). Do all of you
think that the three of them are dead?

Yes. We shall deem that the entire Kotaro family has
perished.

...Hmm. With this, the punishment of the renegade ninja is
complete. Those who break the laws of Fuma shall not be
spared! Let this be a lesson to all!
--Eh!? All three of them, in the pond...?

Yes. Right before the old man's eyes... all three of them
threw themselves into the pond and passed away.
Momiji. Where were you last night? Answer me.

Where did you go? Depending on your answer, you won't get
off lightly.
...I went to help Kotaro-san... to the prison...

I, Fuma Kotaro, am the head of this village, the leader, and
the ruler. Even if you are the daughter of the head, aiding
in the escape of a criminal is a betrayal and a grave crime.
Never disappoint me again. Do you understand?

~~~~! Pull yourself together! Korin, Karin! Wake up! You
must not die!
Ooh!? Karin, you're alive! Thank goodness! And Korin...!?
--Korin! Have you come to? Karin and I are safe!
...Hehe... It seems the spell worked well...
Spell...? That strange spell that turned us into stone?

Yes... It's a magic spell I learned from my grandmother when
I was a child... but it seems my body couldn't withstand
it...
----! No! You must not die! If you die, I--!
Please take care of Karin... I love you... Kotaro-sama...

After being enveloped in light, you suddenly collapsed! We
were worried! You've been asleep for quite a long time, but
are you clear-headed now?

Yes, I'm fine... It's like I was having a long dream. I was
happy to see my father and mother from the past...

It seems to be my mother's grave... It looks like my father,
mother, and I, all three of us, spent over a hundred years
turned to stone in this pond... That explains why I
sometimes dream of being underwater. It all makes sense now.

...I've never heard of humans turning to stone. But if
that's true, it would explain why Karin has lived on without
aging since the Sengoku period...

Turned to stone, you say--? Hmm... That might be a technique
used by the ancient demon-slaying shrine maidens.

Yes. To be precise, they were a clan of shrine maidens who
mastered a variety of mystical and magical arts known as
[Sealing Demon-Slaying Shrine Maidens].

Sealing Demon-Slaying Shrine Maidens...? What did those
people do?

They were a specialized unit from the historic capital of
Kyoto whose livelihood was defeating demons and apparitions.
However, as the demons threatening the human world
disappeared and I educated the apparitions not to misbehave,
their purpose was lost and they disbanded... Afterwards,
they scattered across the country.

So... my mother was from the lineage of Sealing Demon-
Slaying Shrine Maidens. That's why she was called a
wandering Miko...

Most likely. The ancestors of the wandering shrine maidens
in Kai were probably Sealing Demon-Slaying Shrine Maidens.
Indeed, it might be related to why Karin is suited for demon
hunting, being from a Miko's lineage.

(Karin has sensed the presence of demons many times before.
Perhaps it's because she carries the blood of those shrine
maidens...)

This village of Fuma... Combining what Momiji-san told me
about the past, I've come to understand what happened here
over a hundred years ago. I must settle things with Kotaro-
who has a connection to this fate.

(Mother... You sacrificed yourself to protect father and
me... You truly gave your life to keep us alive... Thank
you...)

Ohh--!? For some reason, both my physical and technical
strength have been restored.

I'm worried about Lady Momiji who is captured. Let's move
forward. Karin, can you go?

Yes. I've finished paying respects at the grave. The village
of Fuma is just ahead. Let's hurry--
